specialRules.hint: Before the game starts pick one enemy model. The hero gets the Deadly(3) and Sniper special rules when attacking it.
specialRules.name: Accusation
specialRules.label: Accusation
specialRules.description: Before the game starts pick one enemy model. The hero gets the Deadly(3) and Sniper special rules when attacking it.

specialRules.hint: When this unit is activated pick 2 friendly units within 6”, which get Furious next time they fight in melee.
specialRules.name: Aura of Fury
specialRules.label: Aura of Fury
specialRules.description: When this unit is activated pick 2 friendly units within 6”, which get Furious next time they fight in melee.

specialRules.hint: When the hero is activated pick one friendly Artillery unit within 6”, which may either get +2 to its shooting rolls or move up to 6” during its next activation.
specialRules.name: Ballistic Master
specialRules.label: Ballistic Master
specialRules.description: When the hero is activated pick one friendly Artillery unit within 6”, which may either get +2 to its shooting rolls or move up to 6” during its next activation.

specialRules.hint: When this unit is activated pick 2 friendly units within 6”, which get +1 to their rolls next time they fight in melee.
specialRules.name: Battle Aura
specialRules.label: Battle Aura
specialRules.description: When this unit is activated pick 2 friendly units within 6”, which get +1 to their rolls next time they fight in melee.

specialRules.hint: The hero and his unit get the Furious special rule.
specialRules.name: Battle Chant
specialRules.label: Battle Chant
specialRules.description: The hero and his unit get the Furious special rule.

specialRules.hint: If the hero is part of a unit of Infantrymen, Greatswords or Knights, then that unit counts as having Quality 3+.
specialRules.name: Inspiring Presence
specialRules.label: Inspiring Presence
specialRules.description: If the hero is part of a unit of Infantrymen, Greatswords or Knights, then that unit counts as having Quality 3+.

specialRules.hint: When this unit is activated pick 2 friendly units within 6”, which get +1 to their defense rolls next time they take hits.
specialRules.name: Protective Aura
specialRules.label: Protective Aura
specialRules.description: When this unit is activated pick 2 friendly units within 6”, which get +1 to their defense rolls next time they take hits.

spells.name: Wild Form
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” gets +1 to melee rolls next time it fights.

spells.name: Fireball
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” takes 2 automatic hits with AP(2).

spells.name: Protection
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” gets Regeneration next time it’s wounded.

spells.name: Leech
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” takes 1 hit with AP(4) and Deadly(3).

spells.name: Magic Wind
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” may immediately move by up to 6”.

spells.name: Blood Hex
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 6” takes 1 automatic hit per model.
